ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and a large group of the later ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And a crowd of the later.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and also a large throng from those of later times.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and many from the later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And a large group from the latter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And a multitude of those will be from the later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And a numerous company from among the last.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and a throng of the later folk.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And a multitude of those of later time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and a large group of those of later times.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And a multitude from the later generations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and a multitude from the latter [ones].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And a (goodly) number from those of later times.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And a multitude of those (on the Right Hand) will be from the later times (generations).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and a multitude of the later people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And a throng from the latecomers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And a company of the later peoples.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:40] and a multitude of the later ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And a multitude of those of later time) a group of people from the later nations, which is the community of Muhammad (pbuh); and it is also said that both groups of people belong to the community of Muhammad (pbuh).
